name: Ultimate City Car Racer
description:
The city car race begins immediately, join in, show your professional racing skills, and defeat your friends and enemies!

Driving a sports car driving in the quiet countryside, suburban lavender, beautiful lakeside. However, we must break the tranquility here and use our roaring engine to light the passion of the people. Challenge yourself with four different types of challenges: distance, speed, drift and overtaking. Driving on a busy road or on a high-speed city is very exciting. Drift and overtake in this top road race racing game and enjoy the unusual game experience. When you win a racing game, become a real superstar.

Ultimate City Car Racer Features:

- Challenging tasks
- Actual driving and extra fun
- Simple and smooth control
- Stunning visual effects
- Dangerous and tricky path
- Highly realistic racing game
- HD quality 3D graphics
